welcome_message_body: Welcome to Surigao, a charming city known for its stunning beaches, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant marine life. Take some time to explore and enjoy the natural beauty and unique culture that Surigao has to offer!

restaurants.name: Islands Seafood Restaurant

restaurants.address: Rizal Street, 8400 Lungsod ng Surigao, Surigao del Norte
